id.description: The unique identifier of the single send campaign.

ab_phase.description: The A/B testing phase of the single send campaign.

ab_variation.description: The specific variation used for the A/B testing within the campaign.

aggregation.description: The method used to aggregate the data for reporting purposes.

bounce_drops.description: Number of emails dropped due to bounces.

clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the email links.

unique_clicks.description: Number of unique recipients who clicked on the email links.

delivered.description: Total number of successfully delivered emails.

invalid_emails.description: Number of emails marked as invalid or undeliverable.

opens.description: Total number of times the email was opened by recipients.

unique_opens.description: Number of unique recipients who opened the email.

requests.description: Total number of email requests made to send the campaign.

spam_report_drops.description: Number of emails dropped due to being reported as spam.

spam_reports.description: Total number of emails reported as spam by recipients.

unsubscribes.description: Total number of recipients who unsubscribed from the campaign.
